alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 16 at 10:16PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Jackson, eastern Bienville and Lincoln Parishes through 1045 PM CDT... At 1015 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Grambling to 11 miles east of Ringgold. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ruston, Grambling, Simsboro, Vienna, Lucky, Bienville, Quitman, D Arbonne, Brice, Mount Zion, Friendship, Liberty Hill, Mount Olive and Unionville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
